text: Godivje () is a village in Municipality of Krivogaštani. ==Demographics== According to the 2002 census, the village had a total of 166 inhabitants. Ethnic groups in the village include:Macedonian Census (2002), Book 5 - Total population according to the Ethnic Affiliation, Mother Tongue and Religion, The State Statistical Office, Skopje, 2002, p. 125. *Macedonians 165 *Serbs 1 ==References== Category:Villages in Krivogaštani Municipality
title: Godivje
